info.name: Railsbank GBP Business Scenarios
info.description: A set of standard business scenarios which can be automatically tested using the runner to regression test before each update.

item.name: Enduser Compliance
item.description: Creates an enduser that breaks a set firewall rule. Resolves the enduser's case in quarantine.

item.name: Receiving GBP (Faster Payments)
item.description: Will test that an outside bank account can credit a ledger

item.name: Create a GBP Ledger for Enduser
Create a second GBP Ledger for Enduser
Interledger Transfer GBP
item.description: Creates an enduser, creates a ledger for that enduser, transfers money to that ledger from the company ledger.

request.description: from ledger id to second ledger id

item.name: Create, credit, and transfer virtual currency between virtual ledgers
Create a Whisky Ledger for Enduser
Create a 2nd Whisky Ledger for Enduser

request.description: from ledger id to second ledger id

item.name: Return GBP + Transactions Compliance
item.description: Creates an transaction that breaks a set firewall rule. Displays that the transaction is in quarantine to prove the rules work.
